hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q 'Cargo.lock'; then echo '{"decision": "block", "reason": "Do not edit Cargo.lock directly. Use cargo add/remove/update instead."}'; fi
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" == *.rs ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && cargo fmt -- "$f" 2>/dev/null; fi; done

cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && echo '--- Quality Gate Check ---' >&2 && FAILED=0 && echo 'Running cargo fmt --check...' >&2 && cargo fmt --check 2>&1 >&2 || { echo '❌ cargo fmt --check failed. Code is not formatted.' >&2; FAILED=1; } && echo 'Running cargo clippy...' >&2 && cargo clippy --all-targets -- -D warnings 2>&1 >&2 || { echo '❌ cargo clippy failed. There are lint warnings.' >&2; FAILED=1; } && echo 'Running cargo test...' >&2 && cargo test 2>&1 >&2 || { echo '❌ cargo test failed. Tests are not passing.' >&2; FAILED=1; } && if [ $FAILED -eq 1 ]; then echo '{"decision": "block", "reason": "Quality gates failed. Fix formatting, clippy warnings, or test failures before completing."}' >&2; exit 2; else echo '✅ All quality gates passed.' >&2; fi
